xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GERONIM: • Trigger an evacuation by using the keycard readers in the Penthouse.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_SHEIKH_DESC: • Take a photo of the Sheikh sleeping.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_REUNION_DESC: • Take a photo of Marcus being reunited with his Daughter.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_WHISKY_: • Serve Stuyvesant his requested drinky at the Art Gallery Bar.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_OILRIG_DESC: • Eliminate Ingram by impaling him on his oilrig model in his office.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESEANT_CHANDELI: • Eliminate both targets with a single chandelier.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_SUN_DESC: • Electrocute Marcus using the Sun at the Art Installation.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DUMP_ELEVATOR_DESC: • Push or dump anyone down an elevator shaft.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_SNIPE_DESC: • Eliminate both targets with a single bullet using a sniper rifle.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_LEDGE_DES: • Eliminate Stuyvesant by pushing or pulling him over a ledge or railing.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_LEDGE_DESC: • Eliminate Ingram by pushing or pulling him over a ledge or railing.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_ASSASSI: • Complete Carl Ingram's task to earn his trust.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SHEIKH_GOLDBAR_DESC: • Pacifiy the Sheikh using a Gold Bar.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_EXIT_SKYDIVING_SUIT_: • Exit the Burj Al-Ghazali while wearing the Skydiving Suit.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_PARACHUTE_DES: • Eliminate each target while they are in air parachuting.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_BANANA_FLIP_DESC: • [REDACTED] Make target evacuating in skydiving suit slip on a banana peel .
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_GOLF_DESC: • Eliminate Carl Ingram by making him strike an Explosive Golf Ball.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_EAT_DESC: • Eliminate Carl Ingram by making him consume poison.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_HACK_SERVER_DESC: • Hack The Server Room without triggering the Silent Alarm.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_BIG4_DESC:
Complete all the Classic challenges on "On Top Of The World".
  • Silent Assassin
  • Silent Assassin, Suit Only
  • Sniper Assassin
  • Suit Only
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Complete "On Top Of The World".
  • Only kill the targets.
  • No bodies found.
  • Do not get compromised.
  • If you are detected by cameras, erase or destroy the evidence.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SUIT:
• Complete "On Top Of The World".
  • Only kill the targets.
  • No bodies found.
  • Do not get compromised.
  • If you are detected by cameras, erase or destroy the evidence.
  • Do it all in your suit.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Complete "On Top Of The World."
  • Assassinate your targets with a sniper rifle.
  • Only eliminate the targets.
  • Do not get spotted.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Assassinate the targets and complete "On Top Of The World".
  • Do it all in your suit.

en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_PEACE_D: • Disturb Carl Ingram while he is on his dictaphone.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GERONIM: • Trigger an evacuation by using the keycard readers in the penthouse.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_SHEIKH_DESC: • Take a photo of the Sheikh sleeping.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_REUNION_DESC: • Take a photo of Marcus Stuyvesant being reunited with his daughter.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_WHISKY_: • Serve Marcus Stuyvesant his requested drink at the art gallery bar.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_OILRIG_DESC: • Eliminate Carl Ingram by impaling him on his oil-rig model in his office.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESEANT_CHANDELI: • Eliminate both targets with a single chandelier.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_SUN_DESC: • Electrocute Marcus Stuyvesant using the sun at the art installation.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DUMP_ELEVATOR_DESC: • Push or dump anyone down an elevator shaft.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_SNIPE_DESC: • Eliminate both targets with a single bullet using a sniper rifle.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_LEDGE_DES: • Eliminate Marcus Stuyvesant by pushing, dumping or pulling him over a ledge or railing.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_LEDGE_DESC: • Eliminate Carl Ingram by pushing, dumping or pulling him over a ledge or railing.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GREY_DE: • Complete the mission story "How The Mighty Fall."
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GREY_NA: Mission Story - How The Mighty Fall
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_EXIT_SKYDIVING_SUIT_: • Exit the Burj Al-Ghazali while wearing the skydiving suit.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_PARACHUTE_DES: • Eliminate each target while they are in the air parachuting.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_GOLF_DESC: • Eliminate Carl Ingram by making him strike an explosive golf ball.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_EAT_DESC: • Eliminate Carl Ingram by making him eat poisoned food.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_HACK_SERVER_DESC: • Hack the server room without triggering the silent alarm.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_BIG4_DESC:
Complete all the Classic challenges for "On Top Of The World."
  • Silent Assassin
  • Silent Assassin, Suit Only
  • Sniper Assassin
  • Suit Only
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Complete "On Top Of The World."
  • Only kill the targets.
  • No bodies found.
  • Do not get compromised.
  • If you are detected by cameras, erase or destroy the evidence.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SUIT:
• Complete "On Top Of The World."
  • Only kill the targets.
  • No bodies found.
  • Do not get compromised.
  • If you are detected by cameras, erase or destroy the evidence.
  • Do it all in your suit.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Complete "On Top Of The World."
  • Assassinate your targets with a sniper rifle.
  • Only eliminate the targets.
  • Do not get spotted.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Assassinate the targets and complete "On Top Of The World."
  • Do it all in your suit.

fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_PEACE_D: • Dérangez Carl Ingram pendant qu'il est sur son dictaphone.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GERONIM: • Déclenchez l'alarme d'évacuation avec les lecteurs de cartes d'accès du penthouse.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_SHEIKH_DESC: • Prenez une photo du Sheikh en train de dormir.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_REUNION_DESC: • Prenez une photo des retrouvailles entre Marcus Stuyvesant et sa fille.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_WHISKY_: • Servez la boisson que demande Marcus Stuyvesant au bar de la galerie d'art.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_OILRIG_DESC: • Éliminez Carl Ingram en l'empalant sur le derrick miniature dans son bureau.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESEANT_CHANDELI: • Éliminez les deux cibles avec un seul lustre.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_SUN_DESC: • Électrocutez Marcus Stuyvesant à l'aide du Soleil de la galerie d'art.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DUMP_ELEVATOR_DESC: • Poussez ou jetez quelqu'un dans une cage d'ascenseur.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_SNIPE_DESC: • Éliminez les deux cibles avec une seule balle de fusil de précision.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_LEDGE_DES: • Éliminez Marcus Stuyvesant en le poussant, le jetant ou le tirant d'un rebord ou par-dessus une rambarde.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_LEDGE_DESC: • Éliminez Carl Ingram en le poussant, le jetant ou le tirant d'un rebord ou par-dessus une rambarde.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SHEIKH_GOLDBAR_DESC: • Neutralisez le Sheikh avec un lingot d'or.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_EXIT_SKYDIVING_SUIT_: • Quittez le Burj Al-Ghazali en portant le costume de parachutisme.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_PARACHUTE_DES: • Éliminez chaque cible alors qu'ils sont en parachute dans les airs.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_GOLF_DESC: • Éliminez Carl Ingram en le faisant frapper une balle de golf explosive.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_EAT_DESC: • Éliminez Carl Ingram en lui faisant manger de la nourriture empoisonnée.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_HACK_SERVER_DESC: • Piratez la salle des serveurs sans déclencher l'alarme silencieuse.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_BIG4_DESC:
Terminez tous les défis Classiques de "Sur le toit du monde".
  • Assassin silencieux
  • Assassin silencieux, en costume
  • Assassin précis
  • En costume
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Terminez "Sur le toit du monde".
  • Abattez uniquement les cibles.
  • Aucun corps trouvé.
  • Ne vous faites pas repérer.
  • Si vous êtes repéré par les caméras, effacez ou détruisez la vidéo.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SUIT:
• Terminez "Sur le toit du monde".
  • Abattez uniquement les cibles.
  • Aucun corps trouvé.
  • Ne vous faites pas repérer.
  • Si vous êtes repéré par les caméras, effacez ou détruisez la vidéo.
  • Ne vous déguisez pas.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Terminez "Sur le toit du monde".
  • Éliminez vos cibles au fusil de précision.
  • Éliminez uniquement la cible.
  • Ne vous faites pas repérer.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Éliminez les cibles et terminez "Sur le toit du monde".
  • Ne vous déguisez pas.

it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_PEACE_D: • Disturba Carl Ingram mentre è al dittafono.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GERONIM: • Attiva il protocollo di evacuazione usando i lettori di chiavi magnetiche nell'attico.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_SHEIKH_DESC: • Scatta una foto allo sceicco mentre dorme.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_REUNION_DESC: • Scatta una foto del ricongiungimento di Marcus Stuyvesant con sua figlia.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_WHISKY_: • Servi a Marcus Stuyvesant il suo drink al bar della galleria d'arte.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_OILRIG_DESC: • Elimina Carl Ingram impalandolo sul modellino della piattaforma petrolifera nel suo ufficio.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESEANT_CHANDELI: • Elimina entrambi i bersagli con un unico lampadario.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_SUN_DESC: • Folgora Marcus Stuyvesant usando Il Sole nell'installazione artistica.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DUMP_ELEVATOR_DESC: • Spingi o getta qualcuno nella tromba dell'ascensore.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_SNIPE_DESC: • Elimina entrambi i bersagli con un unico proiettile, usando un fucile da cecchino.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_LEDGE_DES: • Elimina Marcus Stuyvesant spingendo, gettandolo o tirandolo giù da una sporgenza o un parapetto.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_LEDGE_DESC: • Elimina Carl Ingram spingendolo, gettandolo o tirandolo giù da una sporgenza o un parapetto.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GREY_DE: • Completa la storia della missione "La caduta dei giganti".
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GREY_NA: Storia della missione - La caduta dei giganti
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SHEIKH_GOLDBAR_DESC: • Neutralizza lo sceicco usando un lingotto d'oro.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_EXIT_SKYDIVING_SUIT_: • Esci dal Burj Al-Ghazali indossando la tuta da paracadutista.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_PARACHUTE_DES: • Elimina ogni bersaglio mentre è in volo con il paracadute.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_GOLF_DESC: • Elimina Carl Ingram facendogli colpire una pallina da golf esplosiva.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_EAT_DESC: • Elimina Carl Ingram facendogli mangiare cibo avvelenato.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_HACK_SERVER_DESC: • Manometti la stanza dei server senza attivare l'allarme silenzioso.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_BIG4_DESC:
Completa tutte le sfide classiche di "In cima al mondo".
  • Assassino silenzioso
  • Assassino silenzioso, Solo abito
  • Assassino di precisione
  • Solo abito
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Completa "In cima al mondo".
  • Elimina solo i bersagli.
  • Fai in modo che nessun corpo sia rinvenuto.
  • Non mettere tutto a repentaglio.
  • Se vieni inquadrato dalle telecamere, cancella o distruggi le registrazioni.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SUIT:
• Completa "In cima al mondo".
  • Elimina solo i bersagli.
  • Fai in modo che nessun corpo sia rinvenuto.
  • Non mettere tutto a repentaglio.
  • Se vieni inquadrato dalle telecamere, cancella o distruggi le registrazioni.
  • Indossa solo il tuo abito.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Completa "In cima al mondo".
  • Elimina i bersagli con un fucile di precisione.
  • Elimina solo i bersagli.
  • Non essere individuato.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Elimina i bersagli e completa "In cima al mondo".
  • Indossa solo il tuo abito.

de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_PEACE_D: • Stören Sie Carl Ingram, während er am Diktafon ist.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GERONIM: • Lösen Sie mit den Schlüsselkartenlesern im Penthouse eine Evakuierung aus.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_SHEIKH_DESC: • Machen Sie ein Foto vom schlafenden Scheich.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_REUNION_DESC: • Machen Sie ein Foto, wenn Marcus Stuyvesant mit seiner Tochter wiedervereint wird.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_WHISKY_: • Servieren Sie Marcus Stuyvesant seinen gewünschten Drink in der Bar der Kunstgalerie.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_OILRIG_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie Carl Ingram, indem Sie ihn mit dem Modell des Bohrturms in seinem Büro aufspießen.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESEANT_CHANDELI: • Eliminieren Sie beide Ziele mit einem einzigen Kronleuchter.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_SUN_DESC: • Versetzen Sie Marcus Stuyvesant mit der Sonne an der Kunstinstallation einen Stromschlag.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DUMP_ELEVATOR_DESC: • Schubsen oder beseitigen Sie jemanden in einem Aufzugschacht.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_SNIPE_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie beide Ziele mit einer einzigen Kugel des Scharfschützengewehrs.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_LEDGE_DES: • Eliminieren Sie Marcus Stuyvesant, indem Sie ihn über eine Kante oder ein Geländer stoßen, beseitigen oder ziehen.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_LEDGE_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie Carl Ingram, indem Sie ihn über eine Kante oder ein Geländer stoßen, beseitigen oder ziehen.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GREY_DE: • Schließen Sie die Story-Mission „Wie die Mächtigen fallen“ ab.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SHEIKH_GOLDBAR_DESC: • Stellen Sie den Scheich mit einem Goldbarren ruhig.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_EXIT_SKYDIVING_SUIT_: • Verlassen Sie den Burj Al-Ghazali, während Sie den Skydiver-Anzug tragen.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_PARACHUTE_DES: • Eliminieren Sie alle Ziele, während diese bei einem Fallschirmsprung sind.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_GOLF_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie Carl Ingram, indem Sie dafür sorgen, dass er gegen einen Explosiven Golfball schlägt.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_EAT_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie Carl Ingram, indem Sie dafür sorgen, dass er vergiftete Nahrung zu sich nimmt.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_HACK_SERVER_DESC: • Hacken Sie den Serverraum, ohne den Stillen Alarm auszulösen.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_BIG4_DESC:
Schließen Sie alle Klassiker-Herausforderungen bei „An der Spitze der Welt“ ab:
  • Lautloser Killer
  • Lautloser Killer, Anzugpflicht
  • Sniper Assassin
  • Anzugpflicht
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Schließen Sie „An der Spitze der Welt“ ab.
  • Eliminieren Sie nur die Ziele.
  • Keine Körper dürfen gefunden werden.
  • Bleiben Sie unbemerkt.
  • Werden Sie von Kameras gefilmt, löschen oder vernichten Sie die Beweise.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SUIT:
• Schließen Sie die „An der Spitze der Welt“ ab.
  • Eliminieren Sie nur die Ziele.
  • Keine Körper dürfen gefunden werden.
  • Bleiben Sie unbemerkt.
  • Werden Sie von Kameras gefilmt, löschen oder vernichten Sie die Beweise.
  • Erledigen Sie alles in Ihrem Anzug.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Schließen Sie „An der Spitze der Welt“ ab.
  • Eliminieren Sie die Ziele mit einem Scharfschützengewehr.
  • Eliminieren Sie nur die Ziele.
  • Bleiben Sie unbemerkt.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Eliminieren Sie die Ziele und schließen Sie „An der Spitze der Welt“ ab.
  • Erledigen Sie alles in Ihrem Anzug.

es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_PEACE_D: • Incordia a Carl Ingram mientras usa el dictáfono.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GERONIM: • Usa los lectores de tarjetas del ático para provocar una evacuación.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_PHOTO_REUNION_DESC: • Haz una foto del reencuentro de Marcus Stuyvesant con su hija.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_WHISKY_: • Sírvele a Marcus Stuyvesant la copa que te pida en el bar de la galería de arte.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_OILRIG_DESC: • Elimina a Carl Ingram atravesándolo con la maqueta de la torre de perforación que tiene en el despacho.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESEANT_CHANDELI: • Elimina a los dos objetivos con un mismo candelabro.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_SUN_DESC: • Electrocuta a Marcus Stuyvesant con el Sol de la instalación de arte.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DUMP_ELEVATOR_DESC: • Empuja o lanza a alguien por el hueco del ascensor.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_SNIPE_DESC: • Elimina a ambos objetivos disparando una sola bala desde el fusil de francotirador.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_STUYVESANT_LEDGE_DES: • Elimina a Marcus Stuyvesant empujándolo o tirándolo por una cornisa o barandilla.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_LEDGE_DESC: • Elimina a Carl Ingram empujándolo o tirándolo por una cornisa o barandilla.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_ASSASSI: Historia de la misión: Ave de presa
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GREY_DE: • Completa la historia de la misión: «Caída de poder».
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_GREY_NA: Historia de la misión: Caída de poder
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_MISSIONSTORY_ASSASSI: • Completa la historia de la misión: «Ave de presa».
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SHEIKH_GOLDBAR_DESC: • Noquea al jeque con un lingote de oro.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_EXIT_SKYDIVING_SUIT_: • Sal de Burj Al-Ghazali enfundado en un traje de paracaidista.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_DOUBLE_PARACHUTE_DES: • Elimina a cada uno de los objetivos mientras se lanzan en paracaídas.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_GOLF_DESC: • Elimina a Carl Ingram haciendo que golpee una pelota de golf explosiva.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_INGRAM_EAT_DESC: • Elimina a Carl Ingram haciendo que consuma comida envenenada.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_HACK_SERVER_DESC: • Hackea la sala de servidores sin activar la alarma silenciosa.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_BIG4_DESC:
Completa todos los desafíos clásicos de «En la cima del mundo».
  • Asesino silencioso.
  • Asesino silencioso, solo con traje.
  • Asesino francotirador.
  • Solo con traje.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Completa «En la cima del mundo».
  • Elimina solo a los objetivos.
  • Que no descubran cuerpos.
  • No te veas comprometido.
  • Si te detectan las cámaras, borra o destruye las pruebas.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SUIT:
• Completa «En la cima del mundo».
  • Elimina solo a los objetivos.
  • Que no descubran cuerpos.
  • No te veas comprometido.
  • Si te detectan las cámaras, borra o destruye las pruebas.
  • No te cambies de traje.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SNIPER_ASSASSIN_DESC:
• Completa «En la cima del mundo».
  • Elimina a los objetivos con un rifle de francotirador.
  • Elimina solo a los objetivos.
  • Evita que te descubran.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_GECKO_SUIT_ONLY_DESC:
• Elimina a los objetivos y completa «En la cima del mundo».
  • No te cambies de traje.
